Text: Tak Ehab fʼe̩wñ du kʼE̩laija che ka ñw Je̩ze̩be̩l, kpai alu kʼi nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa amakache̩ le̩ chaka.
Taku Je̩ze̩be̩l fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo E̩laija kakini, Omi ma dʼoji-we̩ che dab oji e̩ne̩ʼka ef uma gbogbo wʼe̩gba-i o̩na n, mak amo̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che ñwu mi, kpʼe̩wñ ki tʼabe̩le̩ le ta.
Tak e̩gba kʼE̩laija fʼe-le̩ ma, i kwane̩, oñ i ra le tod oji-wñ, oñ i lewa Birshiba, e-ku Juda ne̩. I la tʼe̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ no̩ o̩mo̩.
Ama owñ onugo nyʼajetachi ule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka, oñ i lewa gugu of oli re̩te̩m. Tak i chane̩ edʼo̩jo̩ uku. Oñ i kakini, E-le̩ bo̩jo̩; fa-i, O Jihofa, mʼoji-mi du; todu omi nyo̩ tʼamata-mi le n.
Tak i kwodachi of oli re̩te̩m oka o̩mo̩ alolu. E̩ la go, onuche̩ O̩jo̩ʼka do̩wo̩kadʼo, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ je̩ e̩wñ.
Tak i go, e̩ la go, uje̩wñ oka ku ma ro̩ oj okuta ki kpuna dʼugbo oji-wñ kpʼo̩cha omiofo ge̩. Tak i je̩, oñ i ñmo̩, tak i murida adachi.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ ño̩ lewa onuʼkeji, oñ i do̩wo̩kadʼo, i kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ je̩, todabu kʼule̩-i tʼe̩ le.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ je̩, i laño̩ ñmo̩. Oñ uje̩wñ kʼi je̩ le̩ dʼukpahiu ñw u tak i le o̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpʼodu o̩gbo̩ meji gbogbo wa Ho̩re̩b, uwo O̩jo̩.
Oñ i lewa owoʼka o̩mo̩. O̩mo̩ i la ru. E̩ la go, o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che emi, E̩laija?

Tak i kakini, Omi te̩tajogu Jihofa O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du nana; todu amo̩ma Israe̩l hi alo-we̩ tinyo̩ ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ gulo̩ wane̩, ma la nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa amakache̩-we̩. Omi, omi kate, bo̩; ma laño̩ tene oji e-mi edu ge̩.

Tak i kakini, Dufu nyʼo̩do̩da, kʼe̩ dago o̩gba Jihofa oj uwo-i. E̩ la go, Jihofa lale, tak afu inaina ju akpʼuwo le̩ fo̩, i laño̩ kpʼokuta le̩ fo̩ o̩gba Jihofa ge̩; Jihofa muda dʼef afu le̩ n. Abu kʼalʼu le̩ lale tak ane̩ kwomiejo. Jihofa la dʼef ane̩ ki miejo le̩ n.
Oñ abu kʼane̩ miejo le̩ una ño̩ lewa. Jihofa laño̩ dʼef una le̩ ni ge̩. Oñ abu kʼuna le̩ lale tak omuko̩la me̩ne̩ wa.
Abe̩le̩, abu kʼE̩laija gbʼo̩, i fʼukpo-wñ wenyʼeju, oñ i le dufu. I kwodago alu owo le̩. E̩ la go, omuko̩laʼka wʼugbo-wñ kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che emi, E̩laija?

Oñ i kakini, U te̩tajogu Jihofa O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du nana; todu amo̩ma Israe̩l hi alo-we̩ tinyo, ma la gu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ lo̩, oñ ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼamakache̩-we̩ kpa. Omi, omi kate, bo̩. Ma la tene oji e-mi ku ma du gee̩
Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Mudabi lʼo̩na-we̩ tʼaje̩tachi Damaskus; oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ lewʼo̩mo̩ uwe̩ ki fʼekpo ba tu Hazae̩l oji kʼi mud onu Siria.
Tak uwe̩ abʼekpo tu Jihiu, o̩ma Nishi, oji kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l, kpai E̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat Ebe̩lmehola, uwe̩ abʼekpo tʼo̩ oji kʼi mud akache̩ koji we̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩ne̩ ki afʼo̩kwo̩chageli Hazae̩l o̩wo̩ tane̩, Jihiu akpa. Oñ e̩ne̩ ki afʼo̩kwo̩chageli Jihiu o̩wo̩ tane̩, E̩laisha akpa.
I chaka adʼabe̩le̩, omi tʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie no̩ tane̩ ñw o̩la-mi ef Israe̩l. Owñ chʼokuku du ki ma te̩kpe̩ ñwu Beal in, kpai alu du ki ma akʼo̩ alu n.

Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ i fʼE̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat, li abu kʼi do̩mo̩ aluche̩. Amokuno̩ kʼoli uno̩lo̩ nʼuma o̩lo̩ eji eji ugbo me̩gweji jʼo̩gba-wñ. Owñ la dʼugbo e̩ke̩gweji-ma le̩. Tak E̩laija lale ugbo-wñ, oñ i mʼukpo ko ro̩ bʼo̩ oji ma.
Tak i tʼamokuno̩ le̩ no̩, i la rano E̩laija, oñ i kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi dalukalu ata-mi kpʼiye-mi tak omi atʼe̩ ubi. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Mudabi todu ab u chʼe̩?

Tak i mudabi bʼo̩ ubi te̩, oñ i mʼamokuno̩-wñ meji kʼoli uno̩lo okate nʼuma o̩lo̩ le̩ ko, oñ i fu ma kpa. I la nʼe̩wñ ido̩na amokuno̩ le̩ chʼiji kʼi hi e̩la-ma. Tak i mʼu ko ñw amone̩, ma la je̩. Tak i kwane̩. I la tʼE̩laija ubi, oñ i che e̩wñ ñw u.
